mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_nydsj_zhsj WHERE strength LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{strength}), '%') OR temperature LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{temperature}), '%') OR humidity LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{humidity}), '%') OR rainfall LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{rainfall}), '%') OR quality LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{quality}), '%')
